questions.question_text: Which three parameters must be configured for local EAP-FAST on the controller? (Choose three.)
Which signal does Cisco recommend using at the cell edge when performing a site survey for VoWLAN applications?
How many types of control frames are only used in PCF mode?

discussion.content:
Why its 3 . ? 
The control frames that are used in PCF mode are as follows:
Contention Free End (CF+End)
Contention Free End Ack (CF +end_ack_)
CF-Ack
CF Ack+CF Poll
CF-Poll

questions.question_text: Which three statements must be true for Cisco WLC to support roaming? (Choose three.)

choices.D: Virtual interface IP addresses are the same.
choices.E: Controllers have different versions of code.
choices.B: Controllers operate in different LWAPP modes.
choices.F: Controllers need to have the same hostname.
choices.A: Controllers are in the same mobility group.

discussion.content:
ACD,
Conditions for roaming to occur

1. Controllers must exist within the same mobility domain.

2. Controllers need to have the same code version.

3. Controllers need to use the same LWAPP mode.

4. If ACL is configured, controllers need to have identical ACL.

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/wireless-mobility/wlan-security/115951-web-auth-wlc-guide-00.html

This is a variation of the internal web authentication. It displays a page with a warning or an alert statement, but does not prompt for credentials. The user should click ok. You can enable email input, and the user can enter their email address, which becomes their username. When the user is connected, check your active clients list; that user is listed with the email address they entered as the username. For more information, refer to the Wireless LAN Controller Web Passthrough Configuration Example

questions.question_text: After you configure the Cisco 5508 Wireless Controller v7.6, a customer requests an SSID that allows for client web authentication with email input. Which authentication method should be used?
